entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 12:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
